  index: "my-index-000001",
  settings: {
    analysis: {
      analyzer: {
        my_custom_index_analyzer: {
          type: "custom",
          tokenizer: "standard",
          filter: ["my_custom_word_delimiter_graph_filter", "flatten_graph"],

      filter: {
        my_custom_word_delimiter_graph_filter: {
          type: "word_delimiter_graph",
          catenate_all: true,

  },
});
